bike.description: OCLV® HC Carbon. The ultra-aero design proven by the USPS team in the Tour de France. Developed with aerodynamics mastermind John Cobb and legendary time trialist Lance Armstrong.

components.description: Bontrager Race X Lite Aero: Exceptionally aerodynamic wheelset; 30mm alloy rims, welded for strength and machined for smooth braking; Fully serviceable, Swiss-made hubs; Bladed spokes; Race X Lite Titanium skewers; 770 g, 16h front/930 g, 16h rear
Selle San Marco Era Luxe, Cro-Moly rails
